Html:
I was wondering if there's a way to create new items in Rawr without a wowhead or armory link? I'd like to create new items to adjust stats on like if I reforged an item, but I don't want to just adjust the real item.

Thanks in advance for your help and sorry if I missed this somewhere else.

It's possible (this is for Rawr3/4). Just add new item in item browser like you would add a real item, but instead of a real item id use some large number out of range of normal items. After that look for item named [Downloading from Armory]. Obviously since it doesn't really exist it'll stay that way, so just click on edit and enter your own stats and name.
